works.description:
Hello sir,

I would like to bring into your Kind Attention that soon after you removed
 
my copyrighted Content from the thief's blog by Deleting his posts, he  
continues to copy my content and Publishes these posts on his blog  
(http://ibpsupdate.blogspot.in/) with new URL's or by re-publishing these 

posts with changed Titles.Here is the Locations of my copyrighted  Content
 
that is Illegally copied by the thief
